content: Would like to delete last commit, which Git command should I use?
You can use git reset --soft HEAD~1 to undo the commit but keep changes.
Does this course cover probability topics like Discrete Mathematics II?
Not exactly. This course is more about analyzing algorithms.
If I apply a force of +10 N to the right and friction acts with -10 N to the left, why are the signs important?
The signs indicate the direction of the forces.

Not all, focus on the main types like R, I, and J formats.
